page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT CENTRES
page.content: There are four main centres in the area,the ABC cinema,the Baseball Ground,Confettis Night Club and the Showboat Leisure Centre. The ABC was originally the Odeon {Cinema,}now it doubles as a bingo hall as well.It shows up-to-date releases drawing people from the whole of Derby. The Baseball Ground is the{football stadium of Derby County Football Club('the Rams'). It is used throughout the winter for Saturday afternoon and mid-week matches by the present Third Division club. Confettis was originally Derby's {Grand Theatre.}Now it is a{night club with disco dancing for the mainly 16-25 year old age group. Showboat is open every day until late evening and has various game machines including modern video type.
